front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Local and metropolitan area networks -- Time-Sensitive Networking for Fronthaul Amendment: Enhancements to Fronthaul Profiles to Support New Fronthaul Interface, Synchronization, and Syntonization Standards
front.abstract: Enhancements to fronthaul profiles are defined in this amendment to IEEE Std 802.1CM-2018 in order to address new developments in fronthaul interface standards and in related synchronization and syntonization standards
